9NG32NPLWB2G.title: Mobile File Transfer
9NG32NPLWB2G.description: File sharing has never been easier with the use of QR codes. Our app allows you to quickly and securely share files with anyone, anywhere. Simply select the file you wish to share and generate a QR code. The recipient can then scan the QR code using their smartphone camera, and the file will be instantly transferred to their device. With our app, there's no need for cables, Bluetooth, just Wi-Fi connections. Sharing files has never been so convenient! Whether you're sharing photos, documents, or any other type of file, our app makes it quick and easy to share.

9N1VP8WDQK4D.title: Monster Hunter Rise
9N1VP8WDQK4D.description: Rise to the challenge and join the hunt! In Monster Hunter Rise, the latest installment in the award-winning and top-selling Monster Hunter series, you’ll become a hunter, explore brand new maps and use a variety of weapons to take down fearsome monsters as part of an all-new storyline.

9NMS4SFNBGBH.title: Dead by Daylight Windows
9NMS4SFNBGBH.description: Death Is Not an Escape. Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught, tortured and killed.

9NZDHXL9SJJ8.title: Persona 5 Royal
9NZDHXL9SJJ8.description: Don the mask and join the Phantom Thieves of Hearts as they stage grand heists, infiltrate the minds of the corrupt, and make them change their ways!

9PB32Z8GQR0P.title: Vampire Survivors: Legacy of the Moonspell
9PB32Z8GQR0P.description: Legacy of the Moonspell is the first DLC for Vampire Survivors.

9PD5BM2Z8C4L.title: Vampire Survivors
9PD5BM2Z8C4L.description: Vampire Survivors is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements.

9PMM6V93MRKW.title: Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony Anniversary Edition
9PMM6V93MRKW.description:
Danganronpa V3 is finally available on Xbox!

Welcome to a new world of Danganronpa, with an all-new "psycho-cool" environment and cast of characters! 
Survive through the revamped Class Trials with its myriad of new minigames!

9P4811KBD5R9.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R
9P4811KBD5R9.description:
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R brings Hirohiko Araki's masterpiece to life in fighting game form!

Battle with 50 colorful characters from the world of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, wielding Stands, Hamon, and more!
See how characters who could never meet in the story interact when they come face to face!

Even newcomers to the fighting game genre can have fun with one-button combos and ultimate moves.

9N27NM3BT3ML.title: Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair Anniversary Edition
9N27NM3BT3ML.description:
In celebration of its 10-year anniversary, Danganronpa 2 is now available！

Please enjoy this Danganronpa reborn
with improved gameplay systems and a new gallery feature.

9MZTL351VPXP.title: PDF Manager - Merge, Split, Trim
9MZTL351VPXP.description:
Merge, split, extract, and combine PDFs with PDF Manager! An "Essential App" as selected by the Microsoft Store.

PDF Manager is a powerful, easy-to-use app for merging and editing PDF files.

Merge, reorder, and split pages across multiple documents. Extract, rotate, and delete pages instantly, or combine PDFs, all in just a few clicks.

Download PDF Manager today and take control of your PDF files.

--

PDF Manager's team can support your enterprise deployment. See our Enterprise page for more detail.

9P8DL6W0JBB8.title: Hades
9P8DL6W0JBB8.description: Defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash out of the Underworld in this rogue-like dungeon crawler from the creators of Bastion.

C17GQF31D617.title: INSIDE
C17GQF31D617.description: Hunted and alone, a boy finds himself drawn into the centre of a dark project.

9N0QM58559W4.title: Catacomb Master (Windows 10)
9N0QM58559W4.description:
Catacomb Master is a 2d platform game in which you have to play as a treasure hunter cat. Go down into the depths of the catacombs for treasures, use your bow and arrows, test your ingenuity.

Find treasures to become a true Catacomb Master.

9PFD00CZJ35V.title: DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS 2
9PFD00CZJ35V.description: DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS™ 2 is a block-building RPG set in a fantasy land threatened by an evil cult. Explore, battle, create and harvest in the charming single-player campaign or build big projects in the online sandbox mode for up to 4-players.

9PLSCHRN5715.title: Zombie Army 4: Dead War
9PLSCHRN5715.description: Hitler’s hordes are back for more in this spine-chilling shooter! Occult enemies, epic weapons and a new campaign for 1-4 players await, as you fight to save humankind from undead Armageddon!

9MTV87HFMF43.title: FINAL FANTASY XIII
9MTV87HFMF43.description:
FINAL FANTASY XIII comes to Windows!

Final Fantasy XIII is a fantasy RPG in which a band of brave humans struggle against fate in the utopian sky city of Cocoon and the primeval world of Pulse. Follow stylish heroine Lightning's fast paced battles and high adventure in a mysterious new world.

9N1VKWTDKKSD.title: The Shutdown Timer Pro
9N1VKWTDKKSD.description: The Shutdown Pro allows countdown or time-based shut down options. Customizable time tracking and personalized alarm sound features are available. The user-friendly interface makes it easy to use, and there are additional features such as sleep mode and restart.

9NZFZXDRZQLR.title: NORCO
9NZFZXDRZQLR.description: NORCO is a text-based point & click adventure that immerses the player in the sinking suburbs and industrial swamplands of an increasingly surreal and distorted South Louisiana.

9P77VD8MGJX8.title: Moonscars
9P77VD8MGJX8.description: Push the limits of your combat skills, and master new abilities to progress through an unforgiving nonlinear 2D world. Face off against the relentless darkness that seeks to destroy you. In Moonscars, every death is a lesson learnt—and as you overcome each challenge, new truths will be revealed.

9P9JZLNFQ9PT.title: Second Extinction™ (Game Preview)
9P9JZLNFQ9PT.description:
This game is a work in progress. It may or may not change over time or release as a final product. Purchase only if you are comfortable with the current state of the unfinished game.

Big map. Big dinosaurs. Big guns. Face an ever changing threat level with your friends. Second Extinction is an online FPS with a bite.

9N8VS0FL4BG2.title: Railway Empire 2 - Digital Deluxe Edition (Win)
9N8VS0FL4BG2.description: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the full Railway Empire 2 game, the original soundtrack, exclusive skins for each of the three sizes of your railway stations, an exclusive skin for your company HQ, and an exclusive skin for two locomotives.

9NDXLPW4TTF2.title: Railway Empire 2 (Win)
9NDXLPW4TTF2.description: All aboard the express train to riches and fame in Railway Empire 2! Grow your company into the largest railway company of the continent and outsmart your competitors as you connect cities and companies with an ever-expanding network of rail lines, bridges, and tunnels.

9NGDDQDNCNK2.title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition – Return of Rome
9NGDDQDNCNK2.description: Return of Rome brings the original Age of Empires into Age of Empires II: DE as a brand new, self-contained experience. Relive the triumph and trials of antiquity with the original sixteen civilizations — plus one brand-new civilization, the Lac Viet.

9NCQBSH49JLW.title: Boss Rush: Mythology (Windows)
9NCQBSH49JLW.description: Take on the role of a mysterious knight who travels across different worlds in search of the most difficult opponents. Fight famous enemies from Greek, Scandinavian, Slavic and Egyptian mythologies and show everyone who is the strongest warrior! Only boss fights, only hardcore!

9NN41G06MBRP.title: Swordbreaker: Origins (Windows)
9NN41G06MBRP.description:
An illustrated text quest in the Swordbreaker universe

The Mingals are approaching the borders of Dorgan when the royal army appears on the other side of the bridge. Among the soldiers, there’s our hero in shining armor, whose name is Swordbreaker. He has to either win with everyone or suffer a shameful defeat and condemn the whole kingdom to extermination.
But all this will happen a bit later...

As for now, the young adventurer lives a peaceful life and can’t even imagine what is waiting for him ahead... Strange events take place in the territory of the kingdom of Dorgan. People talk about the mysterious strangers in the northern marshes; someone saw mysterious objects falling from the sky; other people heard a strange hum from under the ground. And one can only guess how many unknown creatures are hidden in forest thickets and dark caves... All this attracts the young man to throw himself into the abyss of incredible adventures.

9PCNSR8MQRS5.title: Weeping Willow (Windows)
9PCNSR8MQRS5.description:
Weeping Willow is a kinetic visual novel in the genre of detective story, which takes place in the small medieval town of Weidendorf. This town was quarantined due to an outbreak of plague in poor neighborhoods.

The story begins with the mysterious disappearance of the husband of the main character, Baron Von Wolf. A few days later he was found in the local parish of the Scarlet Rose Order, but the baroness claims that she does not recognize her husband. Other people confirms the identity of the impostor and no one believes her. Because of the plague quarantine, the young Baroness is a captive of her own home and begins to seriously fear for her life. After this, a series of dramatic events unfold that will irrevocably change her life.

This short story will delight its players with a fascinating plot tied to intrigues, betrayals, and conspiracies.

9N4FF7NQ4QXC.title: Dev CPP App
9N4FF7NQ4QXC.description: C++ and C compilers, as well as over 1,000 tools and features, are included in this IDE.

9NKMRPRN2P7N.title: ScreenBlur
9NKMRPRN2P7N.description:
Friendly but effective screen locker with useful features.
Can lock the PC to limit time spent online by children

9PHB4W1HBMSR.title: Circle Photo Maker
9PHB4W1HBMSR.description: Circle Photo Maker is an app that makes it easy to create stunning circle photos for social media. It provides an array of editing tools, frame and colors, so you can customize your photos and make them stand out.

9NW8LZCVJMQF.title: Creepy Tale 2
9NW8LZCVJMQF.description: Experience the creepy tension of a Brothers Grimm fairy tale in this puzzle adventure game. Follow the young and brave Lars as he embarks on a dangerous journey to save his sister!

9NDZ1GQG6PT6.title: WSafeKids
9NDZ1GQG6PT6.description:
WSafeKids is an incredibly useful application that constantly configures internet filters to block malware and pornography in real time. This way, you can be sure that your children are browsing safely and without access to inappropriate content.

The application provides real-time protection, which means it automatically blocks any website or content that contains inappropriate or dangerous material. Additionally, WSafeKids is compatible with all popular browsers, such as Edge, Chrome, and Firefox, so you can use it without worries.

WSafeKids is very easy to use and comes with a customizable parental control panel. You can change the password at any time to ensure the privacy and security of your family. Furthermore, your children's privacy is completely protected as the application does not collect any personal information.

In summary, if you're looking for an easy and effective way to protect your children while they browse the internet, WSafeKids is the ideal solution. With its ability to constantly configure internet filters to block malware and pornography, you can be sure that your children are browsing safely and without access to inappropriate content. Download WSafeKids now and enjoy the peace of mind of knowing your children are protected!

Setup and usage: 

As mentioned earlier, the default password is 88888888, but it is strongly recommended to change it to a more secure password to ensure the privacy and security of your family.

note: may require elevated permissions on the system as it requires permissions to change the computer's settings. To restore, simply disable the application. Starting automatically with Windows may also require user approval to notify changes to the configuration.

9PDN64SG254G.title: Panda's Village (for Windows)
9PDN64SG254G.description: Help cute pandas to stand against obnoxious neighbors who constantly invade the village of peace!

9P5FHB4Q3KLB.title: All-in-One Movies, Series & Shows
9P5FHB4Q3KLB.description: Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, Disney+, HBO Max, Hulu, Peacock TV, Pluto TV, Tubi TV, Twitch, YouTube TV, Curiosity - Stream all in one app 😊.

9NMLNSQ5DBWX.title: Eternal
9NMLNSQ5DBWX.description:
Make History

One man fights for himself. One man fights for all.

Be one of the first to experience Eternal, an intoxicating journey into the nature of humanity.



※Special Limited-Time Bonus:  For a limited time, owners of Eternal receive Psychomachia ('Eternal Psychomachia GOLD') FREE.

9N824CRX117R.title: Text to Image Creator
9N824CRX117R.description: Transform your words into stunning AI-generated images with our app powered by the DALL-E API. Simply enter a description of what you want your image to be and our app will generate a beautiful and unique image in seconds. With a user-friendly interface and customizable options, our app is perfect for creating high-quality images for social media, presentations, and personal projects. Try it today and bring your words to life with stunning visuals!

THE REAL DRIFTING
- Gives you a unique experience in the handling of sport cars by the simple and the intuitive way 
- If you like to drift, get ready to spend many hours playing this game 
- Use Conjunction of Acceleration and Brake to Drift
- Paint donuts burning tires 
- Animation of the deep smoke while drifting 

What Makes Extreme Drift King So Special?

- Insane feeling of powerful sport cars 
- Unique driving on different tracks
- Racing on high detailed tracks 
- 12 different Sport cars to Unlock

9NKD6T3QMWSJ.title: Ball Race 5: Volleyball
9NKD6T3QMWSJ.description:
This addictive volleyball game for two players will give you unforgettable moments full of emotions and adrenaline. In this game, you move the ball by hitting it through the net and try to score points before your opponent.

What makes Ball Race Volleyball different from other volleyball games? First of all, the game is old-fashioned 2.5D, which means it combines the best elements of 2D and 3D games. Moving the ball through three-dimensional space, combined with dynamic gameplay and quick reflexes, make the game extremely realistic and exciting.

Compete with family or friends. With intuitive controls and simple yet addictive gameplay, anyone can quickly learn to play and enjoy the game.

If you are looking for an addictive and exciting volleyball game, Ball Race Volleyball is perfect for you! Get on the pitch and feel like a real player, score points and achieve victories. Play today and feel the excitement of this fantastic game!

9NP1MVVVSP4B.title: Unreal Parkour
9NP1MVVVSP4B.description: You made an invention that has allowed you to go to any dimension you wish, when suddenly, somebody has taken that device and has used it to send you to a set of dimensions known as Unreal Parkour. Can you escape the Unreal Parkour?

9NN7MG2CQ8RW.title: Wallpaper & Wallpapers App - HD Wallpaper - Wallpapers HD
9NN7MG2CQ8RW.description:
Browse thousands of image wallpapers capturing Nature, Space, Universe, Planets and more in HD & SD. Each day a new Wallpaper is featured. Save to your device or set as your Lock screen Wallpaper or Background Wallpaper 😊.  

Are you a Nature or Space Fan? Do images or wallpapers of nature and Universe interest you? Then, this app is made for you.
Discover the cosmos! Each day a different image or wallpaper of our fascinating universe is featured, along with a brief explanation written by a professional astronomer, courtesy of the NASA. 
You can :
- Download the images or wallpapers in HD & SD. 
- Set it as your Lock screen or Background Wallpaper. 
- Browse images or wallpapers of the past dates.

Features:
-	Browse thousands of Image Wallpapers capturing Nature, Space, Universe, Planets and more in HD & SD
-	Each day a new image wallpaper is featured
-	Brief Explanation of the images or wallpapers
-	Save wallpapers in HD & SD to your device
-	Set Images as Lock screen Wallpaper
-	Set Images as Background Wallpaper
-	Full screen view of the images or wallpapers
-	Beautiful and Intuitive UI
-	Custom Made for Windows
-	No Ads. No Data Collection

9PB23GFTZ4D4.title: SUPER DINO PRO
9PB23GFTZ4D4.description:
Inspired from the famous no-Internet Dinosaur Game of the web browser and It's different & extended to incorporate different levels, enemies, powers and infinite runs … enjoy ;)

Super Dino PRO is a casual new old-school running game that will surprise you with the fresh adventure of old school no-Internet Dinosaur Game of the web browser.

The World of this Game contains dynamic difficulty, various enemies, super bosses, simple game-play, excellent graphics, and soothing music and sounds.

So, the adventure begins! 
Your task is to run through the mysterious jungle. Jump over or destroy the obstacles and super evil enemies, by jumping over them or shooting bullets, if you have Bullet Power or just by your Midas touch by obtaining the Star Power. Last Long to increase your score. But watch for it, as you score more it becomes more and more challenging ;)
It is a challenging and exciting classic game style. Conquer it, and have fun!

[How to play]:
+ Use Space Bar to jump
+ User Arrow keys, Right CTRL, Right ALT to Shoot Bullets 

👉 Let's have a look at what awaits you in this classic game:
[Features]: 
- 30 Levels with Dynamic Difficulty to Unlock
- 8 Infinite Runs with Dynamic Difficulty to Unlock
- 5+ fierce enemies to defeat
- 3 Powers to Obtain (Reverse Speed, Bullet and Star Power)
- Color Changer for checkpoint
- Lighting Arrangement
- High Score Keeper
- Cool control like in classic platform games
- Beautiful high-resolution graphics
- Smooth user interface
- Music and sound effects
- No Ads
- No Internet Required
- Awesome game play similar to the classic retro Game
- Easy and intuitive controls
- Custom Made for Windows

👉 To pass such difficult phases, you should seek help from 3 types of powerful items that come along your way.
+ Get "Reverse Speed Power" to decrease the speed of the game
+ Get "Bullet Power" to throw bomb or bullets at the enemies
+ Get "Star Power" to destroy the enemies just by your touch though for a limited amount of time

9NRHDK0G6JRC.description:
The Gold Edition includes the base game Atomic Heart and the Atomic Pass.

In a mad utopian world, fight for freedom against robots in spectacular combat. If you want to reach the truth, you'll have to pay in blood.

9NF03FH8M6FG.description:
The Deluxe Upgrade Bundle contains 6 DLC sets for Like a Dragon: Ishin!
 - Shinsengumi Captain's Set
 - Ryoma Growth Support Kit

9P1KL7WVV777.title: Ten Dates
9P1KL7WVV777.description: Ten Dates is the sequel to the interactive rom-com, Five Dates, taking place in the post-pandemic world.  Misha, a millennial from London in search of that elusive in-person connection, tricks her best friend Ryan into going to a speed dating event with her. Each with their own five potential matches, Misha and Ryan must pluck up the courage and turn on the charm to date wildly different personalities.

9NHDWH6SSVP6.title: FMV Horror Bundle
9NHDWH6SSVP6.description: Wales Interactive are proud to offer you Night Book, I Saw Black Clouds, and The Bunker all discounted in one bundle!

9PMS76G25V5V.title: AirPlayMirrorReceiver
9PMS76G25V5V.description: AirPlayMirror is a Windows App which uses AirPlay protocol for Mirroring and Casting from Apple devices (iPhone, iPad, MacBook, iMac or MacMini) to a Windows machine. Using AirPlayMirror App, the Windows device can mirror screen of the Apple device or can playback audio/video/photos stored on Apple device or can play YouTube video link from Apple device over the local network. This is highly useful for sharing the screen and content of Apple device with family, friends, colleagues, customers or business partners.

9NCWRB1RHQP6.title: Maze Runner 3D PRO
9NCWRB1RHQP6.description:
Brace yourself to experience an addictive game of Mazes, PAC-O-MAN or PAC-3D-MAN, Ghosts and You full of thrill, excitement and fun in 3D :) 
Hop Along on an exciting journey of PAC eating dots, power pellets and avoiding the Ghost Gang. Run away from the ghost but if you ate the power pellet on time, even the ghosts will be eaten till the effect of the pellet survives. Plant Bombs to destroy Ghosts 
Can you eat all the dots and power pellets before the Ghosts eat You? Why don't we find out...Let's Play 

Controls:

Jump - X key 
Bomb Plant - B Key

9PH5W473KMKT.description:
Two 3D Games in One :)   
1. Football Cue   2. Vertical Fall

Define the angle of your strike, drag to adjust the direction and power, hit the other balls into the GOAL using your Football CUE. The ultimate blend of football and pool. Requires Combine skills from both games to progress.

Key Features:

Vertical Fall 3D is a 3D game in which the players bounce, bump & smash through revolving platforms of different geometries like square, circle, hexagon and many more, revolving in different patterns, to reach the end. 
Sound easy? You wish!
Your ball smashes like a brick through colorful platforms, revolving in particular pattern that block its descent, but if you hit a black one, it's all over! Your ball shatters to pieces and you have to start your fall all over again.
But even black platforms are no match for a fireball falling at full speed! Choose your strategy: speed up like a madman or stop and wait for your next chance to roll and jump. 
Unlock different items to enhance your gameplay. 140+ Levels and 39 Items to unlock

What makes Vertical Fall 3D Special:

The second version of the popular and liked game Ball Race. A game for one or two players in split screen mode. This time, players move on hanging, moving and rotating platforms.
The goal is to get the ball to the finish line as quickly as possible.
You can play alone, breaking your records, or in pairs. Fun for both children and adults.
We can choose from 8 boards, static platforms, moving in one or more directions, rotating and all at once.
We can choose from single tracks or tournament races, where the competition takes place on all tracks in turn, and players collect points for victories. Jumping on different levels we have different power of reflection. You can bounce multiple times, which can increase your bounce power. For greater attractiveness, the game sometimes surprises with the strength of rebound, and sometimes the lack of it.
The best time results on individual routes are also recorded.

9MVJ3VL1V3VP.title: FINAL FANTASY XIII-2
9MVJ3VL1V3VP.description:
FINAL FANTASY XIII-2, the sequel to the smash hit FINAL FANTASY XIII, comes to Windows!

Enjoy the epic and sweeping story, meet new characters, and test yourself with a new, enhanced battle system. It is no longer about facing destiny. Create a new future and change the world!

9NZFJHT080C9.title: Dead by Daylight: Portrait of a Murder Chapter Windows
9NZFJHT080C9.description:
Behold the Portrait of a Murder. The Dead by Daylight Chapter includes a new Killer – The Artist – and a new Survivor, Jonah Vasquez. The new Forsaken Boneyard Realm will be opened for all players. Purchasing this add-on also unlocks an exclusive cosmetic for Jonah: The Crimson Shirt. 

The new Killer is The Artist. Carmina Mora’s surrealist paintings were both compelling and controversial. After a brutal encounter left her maimed, The Artist was taken by The Entity. Twisted into a grotesque vessel of vengeance, she turned anyone in her path into carrion for the flock. Screams will fill the Forsaken Boneyard, a surreal nightmare drawn from her dark imagination. The new Survivor is Jonah Vasquez. Deciphering math equations and the secrets within was second nature for the seasoned codebreaker. Now, he sees the ominous truth at every turn. A formula pointing to a haunting reality beyond comprehension. But as Vasquez knows better than most, there’s strength in numbers.

9N9P97STB7FG.title: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Deluxe Upgrade Pack
9N9P97STB7FG.description: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Deluxe Edition features five spectacular prehistoric animals, including all-new marine and flying reptiles, as well as six unique building signs, and three exciting vehicle skins inspired by the Dinosaur Protection Group to use across your Ranger Team, Capture Team, and Mobile Vet Unit teams in Challenge and Sandbox modes.

9PB59KL55HDV.title: Bloodshore
9PB59KL55HDV.description: Bloodshore is an interactive action movie about a televised battle royale between high-profile streamers, entertainers and death row inmates. You control the fate of Nick, a washed-up actor who fights for a life-changing cash prize.

9N1XTPLC8DGB.title: Dead by Daylight: Hour of the Witch Chapter Windows
9N1XTPLC8DGB.description:
Hour of the Witch is a new Chapter in Dead by Daylight. It includes a new Survivor, Mikaela Reid. Purchasing the add-on unlocks both the new Survivor and her exclusive item: Mikaela’s Crescent Camisole.  

Haunted by the passing of her father, new Survivor Mikaela Reid found comfort in the unlikeliest of sources: horror stories. The more she read, the more she also wrote, sharpening her own tales of horror while developing a keen interest in witchcraft. After receiving an invitation to read her work at the renown Endless Halloween Festival, Mikaela found herself plagued by a series of disturbing events. Recurring nightmares. Strange visions. The disappearance of a friend. When she finally took to the stage on All Hallow’s Eve to tell her tale a thick black Fog engulfed her, to the audience’s amazement. Mikaela Reid was never seen again.

9NCFNFTSBM96.title: Into the Pit
9NCFNFTSBM96.description: A fast-paced retro-FPS roguelite! As a member of a family of lore-hunting mystics you are summoned to a cursed village, drawn by rumors of a demonic portal. Dark magics have overwhelmed the village, It's up to you to rescue the survivors, grow your powers, and journey forth INTO THE PIT.

9MZCCHNRK9R1.title: Ring of Pain

Delve into randomly generated ring dungeons where encounters come to you!
Observe and plan your route. Will you go for the loot or backstab a creeping horror? As you scavenge, fight and sneak to new encounters, the ring reacts to your actions.

Play as fast or slow as you like in this challenging, turn-based roguelike. Just be careful where you tread - You may find yourself ambushed, or worse...

9P8GKHVJ4R29.title: Blue Hedgehog Run

**A computer keyboard is required.

9PD0BCV3WKD1.title: SmartFinder
9PD0BCV3WKD1.description:
Find your documents immediately in one click!
SmartFinder allows you to use an innovative way to search for your files on the Desktop with an experience similar to Google's web search!

See SmartFinder in action on YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLG6jFnBRDFm8aOs9EZrsJ_490X1nWvsH2

With SmartFinder you have everything just a click away and in one single view!
From the possibility of opening the first relevant files already while typing the words to be searched, to the links with the meta-data to directly filter the results, to the display of an extract of the document with the searched words highlighted!
What if you need to know which files have the same content? Yes, with SmartFinder you can do this and much more, read all the product features we have developed to make you always find what you are looking for and more!

WHY:
SmartFinder was born above all from one of our primary needs since, working in the field of "Research and development" and having thousands of digital documents (scientific articles, books, theses, ...), it is essential for our productivity to have a search engine tool of highly efficient documents in terms of time and quality of results.

Today we use SmartFinder to search for any type of document workplace files or not!

LANGUAGE:
You can search the contents of the file in any language (English, French, Italian, Spanish, German, Polish, Indian or whatever you want!)

FEATURES:
- Find any combination of words to search: the words entered are searched regardless of the character type (upper or lower case) and their order;
- Suggestion of the words to search for: while typing the word to search for, the completion of the word entered and further words relevant to the context are suggested;
- Instant search: while typing the words to search for, the first relevant files are presented;
- Metadata: the search results show all the most significant metadata of the document (title, authors, publisher, keywords, ..);
- Highlight: the search results show an extract of the text for each document with the searched words highlighted;
- Links in the search results: for each file found there are links to automatically open the found file, open the folder it belongs to and filter the results for some meta-data;
- Refine your search: you can refine your search with the metadata of the document (author, publisher, keyword, ...) or through the category to which it belongs (video, audio, ebook, ...);
- Sort the results: you can sort the results by relevance, size, last update date;
- Search with special characters: you can use special characters to find sets of words or to exclude words;
- Duplicate files: Instantly detect if there are duplicate files (same content). All duplicate files related to the found document are presented in the search results;
- SmartFinder wherever you want! You can also use SmartFinder from your browser and share the use remotely even with all the devices on your network: read your Desktop files from your mobile phone!
- Search also on virtual folders: you can search on all the folders you share on your disk such as Dropbox, OneDrive or ICloud!
LICENSE TYPE: BASIC
With this license you have the right to use SmartFinder with all the features listed on this page and to receive free lifetime update!
You can search for files by configuring folders that contain up to a maximum of 200,000 files or 100 GB of size!
On the other hand, there is no constraint on configuration changes, it is possible to change the folders on which to index an infinite number of times.

The displayed price is NOT a subscription, you pay only once and use SmartFinder FOREVER!
By purchasing SmartFinder will give you all future updates for free!
Please read the "Terms and conditions" page carefully before purchasing. Contact us for any questions or requests.

SUPPORTED FILE TYPE

.pdf, .p7m, .doc, .docx, .rtf, .pages*, .odt, .xls, .xlsx, .numbers*, .txt, .log, .ppt, .pptx,. key*, .png*, .jpeg*, .jpg*, .tiff*, .bmp*, .gif*, svg*, heic*, .mp3*, .aiff*, .au*, .midi*, .wav*, .mp4*, .mov*, .htm, .html, .css, .js, .xsd, .msg, .eml, .emlx, .epub, .mobi, .csv, .prop, .xml, .md, .c, .h, .m, .mm, .cpp, .cs, .kt, kts, .ps1, .sql, .java

* File types marked with an asterisk (*) are searchable only by filename and some meta-data.

IMPORTANT This App does not support Windows S mode!

PRIVACY
SmartFinder does not collect data and does not send it. All data created by SmartFinder remains on your installation PC.

9P3RMG6MSCFB.title: AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES
9P3RMG6MSCFB.description: In a near-future Tokyo, Special Agent Kaname Date is on the case of a mysterious serial killer. Date must investigate crime scenes as well as dreams on the hunt for clues.

9MZ4V4RG0W81.title: Sable
9MZ4V4RG0W81.description: Embark on a unique and unforgettable journey and guide Sable through her Gliding; a rite of passage that will take her across vast deserts and mesmerizing landscapes, capped by the remains of spaceships and ancient wonders.

9NR6CV8P1ZGH.title: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries - Legend of the Kestrel Lancers
9NR6CV8P1ZGH.description: Join forces with House Davion's Kestrel Lancers and experience first-hand the frontlines of the 4th Succession War. New linear campaign with unique mechanics, authored missions, and custom dialogue and cinematics. Experience All-Out-War scenarios with large-scale expansive combat in 7 new questlines and 10 new "battle" scenarios. Fight all new megacities, new biomes, new garrisons...and much more

9NWS9K95NMJB.title: WSL Manager
9NWS9K95NMJB.description: The ultimate Windows Store App for managing your WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux) installations with ease! 😍

9PJNHM94SW0S.title: Dead by Daylight: Hellraiser Chapter Windows
9PJNHM94SW0S.description:
Hellraiser is a new Chapter in Dead by Daylight. It includes a new Killer, Pinhead. Purchasing the add-on unlocks both the new Killer and an exclusive universal charm: The Lament Configuration.  
 
Demon to some, angel to others, the new Killer is Pinhead: leader of an extra-dimensional group of beings known as the Cenobites. Devoted to exploring the furthest regions of experience through the limitless thrill of pleasure and pain, Pinhead uses hooks and chains to attack his victims, tearing their flesh, and souls, apart in the process. When the puzzle box known as the Lament Configuration – a key to Pinhead’s dimension – was discovered and opened in The Entity’s Realm, he arrived, ready to bestow sweet suffering upon any who crossed his path.

9P4NN8PS1BJQ.title: Tropico 6 - Festival
9P4NN8PS1BJQ.description: Get on your dancing shoes, ‘Festival’ DLC brings the party to Tropico 6! Help El Presidente host a killer party and stave off an ancient entity while he’s at it.

9N31WS0G1FPK.title: Sphere Game Epic
9N31WS0G1FPK.description: Sphere Game Epic is the newest game in the Sphere game franchise.Game created by Diego Paes

9N1L07LKTS5P.title: Paint One
9N1L07LKTS5P.description:
* Use simple lines to outline colorful and imaginative things and objects.
* Support mouse, stylus, and touch.
* Entertainment drawing software, no drawing foundation required.

9N38MMQGBDL5.title: Dead by Daylight: ULTIMATE EDITION
9N38MMQGBDL5.description: The Ultimate Edition gives you access to the base game of Dead by Daylight as well as 34 original Killers and Survivors from previously released chapters.

9MWV1BGFX935.title: Night Book
9MWV1BGFX935.description: Night Book is an interactive thriller about an online interpreter who is tricked into reading an ancient book that summons a demon into her home. From the studios that brought you The Complex, Five Dates, and Maid of Sker.

9NZ5V1T58TLK.title: The Innsmouth Case
9NZ5V1T58TLK.description: The Innsmouth Case is a text adventure game inspired by H.P. Lovecraft and the very first text-based adventure to combine horror and comedy in a fit and proper way.

9MWGJGGBV0HM.title: Tropico 6 - Spitter
9MWGJGGBV0HM.description: It’s all about the fame and prestige. Nobody knows this better than a self-declared despot...uh, statesman, such as El Presidente. Tropico 6’s second DLC skyrockets you into the world of stardom and illustriousness. Interact with superstars by using Spitter, the only short message social networking app officially approved by the Tropican Ministry for Modern Communications & Smoke Signals.

9NWCGBT1VRJS.title: Tropico 6 - Lobbyistico
9NWCGBT1VRJS.description: What do the European Union and corruption have in common? Nothing of course, since the EU is as pure as a drop of the finest Tropican rum. So why not run a field study and get to know more about this curious political entity? And why not run it in Tropico, which is so famously governed by corrupt politicians (except for El Presidente, of course)? Join the EU in their investigations into 'corruptionomics' and unlock new powerful perks in ‘Lobbyistico’ for Tropico 6.

9PHQLPB941BR.title: Tropico 6 - Caribbean Skies
9PHQLPB941BR.description: The beloved dicta…uh, leader El Presidente sets out to conquer the Caribbean Skies! The biggest DLC for Tropico 6 to date takes the fun to new altitudes with - drones. Play a dedicated campaign featuring 5 missions to unlock new play styles and features.

9PN3M3GP698F.title: Tropico 6 - The Llama of Wall Street
9PN3M3GP698F.description: It’s time to play in the major leagues! El Presidente is descending on the world of international brands, big time. Power in politics is never enough for a man with ambitions as great as El Prez, so join forces with the shady…uh, completely trustworthy broker, and help Tropico to establish its status as a global megabrand. Unravel the secrets behind the broker’s sinister master plan, as you try to sabotage the US finance market. In order to assert yourself, you will have to be a llama among wolves. Well, something like that...

9N00RVHLZF4K.title: Immortal Realms - Fangs & Bones
9N00RVHLZF4K.description: Fangs & Bones includes two unique Lords, the Winter Wolf and the Skeleton King, ready to lead your armys of the night to victory. They both come with unique abilities and character models and are available as Lords for your armies.

9NCK543D5BN6.title: Pirate Monkey Run! 2
9NCK543D5BN6.description: Jake and Jade, your favorite pirate monkeys, are on the run again!

9P29W29LSSG2.title: Dead by Daylight: Resident Evil Chapter Windows
9P29W29LSSG2.description: Resident Evil is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, Nemesis; two Survivors, Leon S. Kennedy and Jill Valentine; and a new map. Purchasing the add-on unlocks the new Killer, both Survivors, and an exclusive universal Charm.

9NC9TNXS9C8G.title: Backbone
9NC9TNXS9C8G.description: Backbone is a post-noir narrative adventure. Become raccoon private eye Howard Lotor and explore dystopian Vancouver inhabited by animals as you uncover a deeply personal story of change and transformation.

9N5QH3W2CH8F.title: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries - Heroes of the Inner Sphere
9N5QH3W2CH8F.description: Heroes of the Inner Sphere DLC features a new Career Mode in an expanded Inner Sphere map. Find 7 New Hero ' Mechs, 7 New 'Mech Chassis Types, and lots of new 'Mech Variants to collect. Customize all your 'Mechs with New Weapons and Equipment. Take on New Beachhead mode with Multiple objectives to complete

9N2NKWSZT3LM.title: Notemarks
9N2NKWSZT3LM.description: Simple text note & to-do list tool.

9N5ZJMZH71S7.title: Pirate Monkey Fruit Shoot
9N5ZJMZH71S7.description:
Jake and Jade, your favorite Pirate Monkeys, are back in a new puzzle game! Play as either Jake or Jade. Throw balls into the air. If you connect with two or more other balls of the same color they will pop away. Any balls that are not touching other objects will fall away. Some balls have a piece of fruit, these are the object of the game. When they fall or pop, a piece of fruit will parachute down to the ground. Collect the amount of fruit that the level requires to win the level.

Destroying or dropping balls of a certain color will count towards earning a power-up. Watch as the tanks on the left fill up. Once full, they will glow signifying you have earned that power-up.  Make sure you use them as they will disappear at the end of the level. 

Can you help Jake and Jade collect as much fruit as they can?

Please note:
Creators Collection games, such as this one,  cannot contain Xbox LIVE achievements and as such cannot increase your GamerScore.

9PDZPRDH9QF5.title: The Wild Case (Full)
9PDZPRDH9QF5.description: The Wild Case is a 2D first-person point-and-click adventure. In this story-focused adventure, players meet a cast of colorful characters, experience mysterious encounters, and solve puzzles to progress through the game.

9NLC7H5FM7C4.title: R-Type Final 2 PC Digital Deluxe Edition
9NLC7H5FM7C4.description: The Digital Deluxe Edition contains the full game and the R-Type Final 2 Stage Pass, which includes DLC Set 1, 2, and 3. Altogether they consist of a variety of new stages.

9PCX5KZH5XZ3.title: R-Type® Final 2 PC
9PCX5KZH5XZ3.description: R-Type has returned! The legendary side-scroller is back and better than ever with beautifully rendered 3D graphics, exhilarating shoot-'em-up gameplay, and a multitude of stages, ships, and weapons that will allow you to conduct a symphony of destruction upon your foes.

9P3FHSHCDQV2.title: Nemesis Prime & Goldfire Bumblebee Skin Pack
9P3FHSHCDQV2.description: Once purchased, the Nemesis Prime & Goldfire Bumblebee skins will then become selectable in the game under the SELECT YOUR SQUAD screen.

9P9XCC83XNP9.title: CUBE Game - Arcade Mode Add-on
9P9XCC83XNP9.description:
Up to two players team up as the Autobots against the Decepticons in the greatest sport in the Galaxy, CUBE! Play as the Autobots, solo or with a friend, across four unique Arenas. Once the CUBES are let loose, hold on for as long as possible to score points. Each Autobot and Decepticon has their own special abilities to help your team keep the CUBE.

Once purchased, the CUBE Game will become available to play in Arcade Mode.

9NDX628R66WS.title: Helicopter Money
9NDX628R66WS.description:
Helicopter Money - full game.
A game for one or two players in split-screen mode.the player controls the helicopter and collects the falling coins. He gets 3 points for gold coins, and 2 points for silver ones. There are also chests with coins to find, for each of them the player receives 15 points The player who collects the most value of coins in a given time wins.
The player has many switchable cameras at his disposal, thanks to which he can easily observe the area.

9NT73XSW7VCW.title: Ball Race
9NT73XSW7VCW.description:
In the game, one gamer or from two to four gamer compete against each other controlling their own balls and try to defeat their opponent, navigating a maze full of challenges and surprises in order to reach the finish line first. Racing tracks are full of dangers, such as jumping spiders that make it difficult for players to succeed, as well as auxiliary elements such as blocks to knock the player up and moving platforms to overcome chasms. By collecting diamonds and stars, players gain an advantage that allows them to jump and move faster.

Players can choose selected routes or compete in a tournament, where the competition takes place on all 9 routes in turn. Each route has its record score that can be beaten. Relaxing music plays in the background, adding extra comfort and atmosphere during the game. Ball Race is great entertainment for anyone who likes challenges and competition.

9N54CBKZBV44.title: Dead by Daylight: ALL-KILL Chapter Windows
9N54CBKZBV44.description:
All-Kill is a new chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer—The Trickster—and a Survivor, Yun-Jin Lee. Purchasing the add-on will unlock its new Killer, new Survivor, and an exclusive item for the Survivor: Yun-Jin’s Polka Dotted Blouse.

The new killer is Ji-Woon Hak, better known to fans across the globe as The Trickster. Famed singer by day, calculating serial killer by night, The Trickster thirsts for notoriety above all, treating both his music and his murders as high art. He was beckoned into The Fog on the eve of his most gruesome performance with the promise of an eager audience and an endless encore. The new Survivor is Yun-Jin Lee, a resilient and ambitious music producer who built her reputation on the success of her one and only client – The Trickster. Ignoring evidence of his true nature in favor of her career, Yun-Jin now stands to pay the ultimate price for her decision.

9PBGBFL3504L.title: BALAN WONDERWORLD
9PBGBFL3504L.description: Over 80 different costumes open up all the action you could want! Welcome to a wondrous all-action show, the likes of which has never been seen before!

9N9606CC950J.title: OCTOPATH TRAVELER
9N9606CC950J.description: Eight travelers. Eight adventures. Eight roles to play. Embark on an epic journey across the vast and wondrous world of Orsterra and discover the captivating stories of each of the eight travelers.

9P7J621JRV7K.title: Arkham Horror: Mother’s Embrace
9P7J621JRV7K.description: Inspired by the award-winning board game franchise, Arkham Horror: Mother’s Embrace is an investigation game served with turn-based combat, set in the  haunted worlds of H.P. Lovecraft’s Cthulhu mythos. Plunge into an original story written by Fantasy Flight Interactive’s official writers and explore the American Roaring Twenties.

9PM2P9HQD1ML.title: NieR:Automata BECOME AS GODS Edition
9PM2P9HQD1ML.description: Invaders from another world attack without warning - unleashing the machine lifeforms. To break the deadlock, a new breed of android infantry is sent into the fray: the YoRHa squad. Highly-acclaimed and award winning NieR:Automata™ is a fresh take on the action role-playing game (RPG) genre that gracefully blends mesmerizing action with a captivating story.

9NT0LZNCWLC5.title: Saviors of Sapphire Wings / Stranger of Sword City Revisited
9NT0LZNCWLC5.description: In Saviors of Sapphire Wings, a fallen hero is reincarnated 100 years after being defeated by the Overlord of Darkness. Bond with allies, explore dungeons, and vanquish monsters in this RPG gem!

9NQ93D6MMCZV.title: Image Vectorizer
9NQ93D6MMCZV.description:
Image vectorizer can convert most image file types (BMP, GIF, JPEG, PNG, TIFF, ...) to Vector graphics. Vector graphics are scaleable and do not pixelate at higher zoom levels.

Raster images are created with pixel-based software or captured with a camera or scanner.
One of the main disadvantages is that raster images cannot be resized without losing quality. If the image is magnified enough, its artifacts appear. The halftone dots, film grains, and pixels become apparent. Images of sharp edges become fuzzy or jagged. See, for example, pixelation. Conversely, vector graphics can be scaled to any size without any loss in quality.
vector graphics can be used for logos, page layout, type, line art, or illustrations

9NFSR96G6K4N.title: The Medium
9NFSR96G6K4N.description:
Buy Now for the Xbox Series X|S Edition and Windows 10 PC only.
Discover a dark mystery only a medium can solve. Travel to an old communist resort and use your unique psychic abilities to uncover its disturbing secrets, solve dual-reality puzzles, survive encounters with sinister spirits, and explore two realities at the same time.

9PM3L9379567.title: Video Converter - Plus
9PM3L9379567.description:
**Image Converter Plus is our another product that is Free for the owners of this app**

Video Converter Plus is a powerful and is easy to use tool that can convert your video files to almost any video format (mp4, Flv, Avi, WebM, MOV, Mpeg, Mkv, Wmv, Swf, Gif, Ac3, Ogg, M4v, Rm, and many more) with just one click

Some features:
- Support almost any video format (mp4, Flv, Avi, WebM, MOV, Mpeg, Mkv, Wmv, Swf, Gif, Ac3, Ogg, M4v, Rm, and many more)
- Get our Image Converter Plus for Free
- Powerful and easy to use
- Show Thumbnail of videos
- Convert multiple files at once
- Drag and drop your File
- No internet required
- Free lifetime free updates and new features

9N63G96B77R1.title: SlideCraft Pro: Animated PowerPoint Templates for Impactful Presentations
9N63G96B77R1.description: Creating an impressive PowerPoint presentation has never been this simple. Packed with captivating animations and eye-catching graphics, our slides are designed to leave a lasting impression on your audience. Customize colors, mix and match slides between templates, and achieve extraordinary results with ease.

9MZNKQJ7SL0B.title: Text Grab
9MZNKQJ7SL0B.description: Copy any text you see on screen using quick and easy OCR.

9PBDC0XZ8TXK.title: DRAGON QUEST® XI S: Echoes of an Elusive Age™ - Definitive Edition
9PBDC0XZ8TXK.description: The Definitive Edition includes the critically acclaimed DRAGON QUEST XI, plus additional scenarios, orchestral soundtrack, 2D mode and more! Whether you are a longtime fan or a new adventurer, this is the ultimate DQXI experience. You are the Luminary, a hunted Hero who must uncover the mystery of his fate with the aid of a charismatic band of adventurers.

9NW2X83B4JJV.title: Dead by Daylight: A Nightmare on Elm Street™ Chapter Windows
9NW2X83B4JJV.description:
Who would have thought that dreams could actually do harm? Physical, pain inducing harm? Fear and pain stemming from a scarred soul who seeks revenge for a punishment he deserved. Freddy Krueger will always be remembered - whether you are awake or asleep.

A Nightmare on Elm Street is a Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a new Killer, a Survivor and a Map.

9MTBH5X8XFFR.title: Rain
9MTBH5X8XFFR.description: Growing up an orphan, Rain joined Edenia's army. His strategic genius earned him quick promotion, which he used to learn he was the bastard son of the god Argus, Edenia's Protector. Armed with the knowledge that he's a half god, Rain battles for his place in Edenia's pantheon.

9N7TLV9VZQ08.title: Rambo
9N7TLV9VZQ08.description: John J. Rambo is a former United States Special Forces soldier deeply haunted by his time in Vietnam. He is rough, aggressive and is well known for entering exceptionally dangerous situations alone. Rambo has reactivated his ruthless fighting skills to infiltrate the MK universe.

9NW2MHQ7WPGK.title: Mileena
9NW2MHQ7WPGK.description: Mileena is the product of Shang Tsung's diabolical cloning experiments: a perfect blend of Tarkatan ferocity and athletic grace. Brought forward in the timeline by Kronika, Mileena has learned of her tragic future. Her enemies now must submit, or die.

9PNN6F841PQT.title: Klassic MK Movie Skin Pack
9PNN6F841PQT.description: The Klassic MK Movie Skin Pack includes character likeness & voice from the 1995 film. Christopher Lambert as Protector of Earthrealm Raiden, Linden Ashby as Hollywood Kombatant Johnny Cage, and Bridgette Wilson-Sampras as Island Bound Sonya Blade.

9P1LWFXNQVQ0.title: Bridge Constructor: The Walking Dead
9P1LWFXNQVQ0.description: Prepare for the ultimate mashup experience! Bridge Constructor: The Walking Dead combines the legendary and challenging puzzle gameplay of Bridge Constructor™ with the post-apocalyptic zombie universe of AMC’s The Walking Dead.

9PFZC53PVTDB.title: Mount & Blade: Warband PC
9PFZC53PVTDB.description: In a land torn asunder by incessant warfare, it is time to assemble your own band of hardened warriors and enter the fray. Lead your men into battle, expand your realm, and claim the ultimate prize: the throne of Calradia!

9PLVW2P56H1B.title: Mortal Kombat 11 Ultimate Add-On Bundle
9PLVW2P56H1B.description:
Includes Aftermath Expansion, Kombat Pack 1 & 2.

Aftermath features a brand-new cinematic story centered around trust and deceit. Forge a new history.

• All-New Cinematic Story 
• 12 New Playable Fighters incl. newly added Mileena, Rain & Rambo
• 9 New Skin Packs
• 7 Excl. Skins

9PN5LWP13H12.title: Mortal Kombat 11 Kombat Pack 2
9PN5LWP13H12.description: Kombat Pack 2 includes fan-favorite playable fighters Mileena, Rain and iconic guest Rambo, featuring the likeness and voice of actor Sylvester Stallone.

9P35DPLN1JCN.title: FINAL FANTASY VIII Remastered WINDOWS EDITION
9P35DPLN1JCN.description: The mega-hit RPG, FINAL FANTASY VIII, returns! Now featuring new graphical enhancements and a whole host of options to customize your gameplay experience.

9NF464C2W777.title: Yakuza: Like a Dragon Hero Edition
9NF464C2W777.description:
Become Ichiban Kasuga, a low-ranking yakuza grunt left on the brink of death by the man he trusted most. Take up your legendary bat and get ready to crack some underworld skulls in dynamic RPG combat set against the backdrop of modern-day Japan in Yakuza: Like a Dragon.

Yakuza: Like a Dragon Hero Edition includes Job Set and Management Mode Set DLC.

Russian and Brazilian Portuguese subtitles available in early 2021 via patch update.

Game leverages Smart Delivery allowing access to both the Xbox One title and Xbox Series X title when available. Product does not yet have a firm release date. If pre-ordered, you will be notified when the release date is set and opportunity provided to manage your order.

9PB3TP3MT2Q0.title: Observer: System Redux
9PB3TP3MT2Q0.description: The year is 2084. In a dark cyberpunk world shattered by plagues and wars, become a neural police detective and hack into the jagged minds of others. Make use of anything they felt, thought, or remembered to solve the case and catch the elusive killer.

9NT501RSG6RV.title: Energon Autobot Skin Pack
9NT501RSG6RV.description: Once purchased, the Energon Autobot skins will then become selectable in the game under the SELECT YOUR SQUAD screen.

9PN83T6Q0V6T.title: Neon Autobot Skin Pack
9PN83T6Q0V6T.description: Once purchased, the Neon Autobot skins will then become selectable in the game under the SELECT YOUR SQUAD screen.

9PNFTD49D18W.title: Battle Autobot Skin Pack
9PNFTD49D18W.description: Once purchased, the Battle Autobot skins will then become selectable in the game under SELECT YOUR SQUAD screen.

9PPSZQMST8NT.title: Gold Autobot Skin Pack
9PPSZQMST8NT.description: Once purchased, the Gold Autobot skins will then become selectable in the game under the SELECT YOUR SQUAD screen.

9NLGSP4D06PP.title: Race with Ryan: Adventure Track Pack
9NLGSP4D06PP.description: Expansion pack includes 2 new tracks and 7 new characters for use in Race With Ryan. Available for purchase on October 16th, 2020.

9N938454ZNZB.title: Soviet Music
9N938454ZNZB.description:
It is a music player for valuable historical music from the Soviet Union and other socialist countries.

You can browse and pick your favorite songs by historical period, theme and artist, and add them to your playlist. In addition, you can use keywords to find related songs.

This player is integrated with system's media control module. You can play music in the background, or control the playback of media by system controls like keyboard.

Still we are managing to provide translated content for you. If you meet any trouble while using this Application, Please contact me here.

9P8HN2T2SZGB.title: Kathy Rain
9P8HN2T2SZGB.description: Set in the 90's, Kathy Rain tells the story of a strong-willed journalism major who has to come to terms with her own troubled past as she investigates the mysterious death of her recently deceased grandfather. Armed with her motorcycle, a pack of cigs, and a notepad, Kathy begins to delve into a local mystery surrounding her hometown that will take her on a harrowing journey full of emotional and personal turmoil.

9PFJDSL1CC7G.title: Disgaea 4 Complete+
9PFJDSL1CC7G.description: The ultimate Disgaea has arrived! Hell-raising action and a horde of special features await you in this tale of fiery revolution.

9NFXH0QD1M7C.title: Dead by Daylight: DESCEND BEYOND Chapter Windows
9NFXH0QD1M7C.description: Descend Beyond is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, The Blight, and a Survivor, Felix Richter. Purchasing the add-on will unlock its new Killer, new Survivor, and an exclusive item for the Survivor.

9PH13JG7PZN2.title: The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters
9PH13JG7PZN2.description: The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters is an atmospheric, story-driven game. Immerse yourself in the warped Sehwa district as you encounter an engaging cast of characters, solve puzzles, discover revealing clues, and fight for survival against a relentless psycho.

9PD5W4Z11BRR.title: Remnant: From the Ashes - Subject 2923
9PD5W4Z11BRR.description: In a brand-new continuation of the Remnant: From the Ashes story, meet unexpected allies, traverse unfamiliar zones and dimensions, and overcome new threats to save your world. Complete new quests and conquer unique bosses to acquire additional gear, increasing your chances of surviving the rugged wilderness of Earth and beyond, as you aim to put an end to the Root and restore humanity.

9MTK5LQKZLQ2.title: Sphere Game Extreme
9MTK5LQKZLQ2.description: show skills, control a fast and heavy sphere and overcome obstacles to pass the level

9PN0W216SKZB.title: FINAL FANTASY VII WINDOWS EDITION
9PN0W216SKZB.description: FINAL FANTASY VII, the timeless classic loved by a legion of fans, now comes with a number of helpful extra features! Experience the return of an epic adventure beyond imagination, culminating in the final battle to decide the fate of the planet.

9PP5HXGH2B0D.title: Maid of Sker
9PP5HXGH2B0D.description:
Brave the nightmares of the Quiet Ones. Do not panic…don’t even breathe!

Maid of Sker is a first-person survival horror, set in a remote hotel with a gory and macabre history from British folklore. Inspired by the haunting tales of Elisabeth Williams, discover a suffocating family secret with stealth tactics amongst sound-based AI enemies.

9MWPD4G2CM56.title: Allison's Diary: Rebirth
9MWPD4G2CM56.description: Immerse yourself into this terrifying first person horror adventure, where you will have to explore and search for the truth about the night Allison killed her parents, while trying to survive against the darkness.

9PBLH1322GX0.title: Observation
9PBLH1322GX0.description: Observation is a sci-fi thriller uncovering what happened to Dr. Emma Fisher, and the crew of her mission, through the lens of the station’s artificial intelligence S.A.M.

9NRNPTSGDMV3.title: Dead by Daylight: Silent Hill Edition
9NRNPTSGDMV3.description:
The Silent Hill Edition of Dead by Daylight includes the base game, the Silent Hill Chapter, the Alissa Gillespie outfit for Cheryl Mason and the Dark Wish outfit for The Executioner. 

The Silent Hill Chapter includes a new map, Midwich Elementary School:  the childhood trauma that once took place in its halls has since manifested itself into a twisted, nightmarish design.  The new Killer is The Executioner: take control of Pyramid Head and wield his great knife to unleash his twisted brand of punishment on all who cross him. The new Survivor is Cheryl Mason, a courageous, outspoken woman who survived the hellish Otherworld of Silent Hill, and exacted revenge on the Order that killed her father. With experience beyond her years, she's prepared to once again stand against any evil that confronts her.

9NWVSBTG89KQ.title: Dead by Daylight: Silent Hill Chapter (Windows)
9NWVSBTG89KQ.description:
Silent Hill is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, The Executioner; a Survivor, Cheryl Mason; and a map. Purchasing the add-on will unlock its new Killer, new Survivor, and an exclusive universal Charm: the Seal of Metatron. 

The Silent Hill Chapter includes a new map, Midwich Elementary School:  the childhood trauma that once took place in its halls has since manifested itself into a twisted, nightmarish design.  The new Killer is The Executioner: take control of Pyramid Head and wield his great knife to unleash his twisted brand of punishment on all who cross him. The new Survivor is Cheryl Mason, a courageous, outspoken woman who survived the hellish Otherworld of Silent Hill, and exacted revenge on the Order that killed her father. With experience beyond her years, she's prepared to once again stand against any evil that confronts her.

9MV44LWL6P4Q.title: RoboCop
9MV44LWL6P4Q.description: Alex Murphy was a dutiful police officer who was brutally executed by a local gang. Brought back to life through OCP technology, Murphy was transformed into RoboCop, a highly advanced cybernetic police officer designed to uphold the law and protect the innocent.

9NGL66268B7T.title: Sheeva
9NGL66268B7T.description: The male Shokan scoffed when Sheeva entered their contest to choose their next leader. Sheeva proved herself more than their equal. After a resounding victory, she was crowned Queen of the Shokan. As Queen, Sheeva leads her people in the fight to attain their rightful place.

9NZMXV1ZHW6W.title: Fujin
9NZMXV1ZHW6W.description: The God of Wind, Fujin serves the Elder Gods alongside his brother, Raiden. Affable and lighthearted, he's adept at inspiring peoples' innate capacity for goodness and heroism. Fujin believes Earthrealm's best days are still to come, and fights to ensure that bright future.

9PM2S7T793JN.title: Embedder
9PM2S7T793JN.description:
The easiest way to send custom messages and embeds to your Discord server!

Customize your server, post news using your saved templates for messages, and manage your Bot account without the need to open the developer portal. You have everything you need here.

9NMHJHHZRL3N.title: Swamps of Corsus
9NMHJHHZRL3N.description: Begin your journey across the dangerous and corrupted worlds of Remnant: From the Ashes with a new mode and expanded map content in Swamps of Corsus.

9NT9308XX0V9.title: Mortal Kombat 11: Aftermath Expansion
9NT9308XX0V9.description:
Experience MK's first-ever major expansion. Aftermath features a brand-new cinematic story centered around trust and deceit. Forge a new history.

Includes: 

• All-New Cinematic Story 
• 3 New Playable Fighters - Sheeva, Fujin & guest RoboCop
• 3 New Skin Packs

9P1Z2XCBMD35.title: Race With Ryan: Surprise Track Pack
9P1Z2XCBMD35.description: Expansion pack includes 2 new tracks and 5 new characters for use in Race with Ryan.

9NLNKHG2ZNPK.title: Smart MindMap
9NLNKHG2ZNPK.description: Smart MindMap helps you easily create high-quality mind maps, business diagrams, flow charts, UML diagrams, ER diagrams, engineering designs, Specification and Description Language (SDL) diagrams, organizational charts.

9N4C2ZZC4QFF.title: Spawn
9N4C2ZZC4QFF.description: Al Simmons, once the U.S. government's greatest soldier, was mercilessly executed by his own men. Resurrected from the ashes of his own grave, Simmons is reborn as a creature from the depths of Hell. Now he must fight for supremacy against all Kombatants.

9NC14C0TP5LK.title: JSON Viewer & Formatter
9NC14C0TP5LK.description:
Paste or import your JSON text into JSON Viewer & Formatter and it will validate, beautify and  minify your input text. JSON Viewer & Formatter is a lite, simple, easy to use and stable tool to help you work with JSON format and convert validated JSON text to other formats like XML or CSV.

Some features :
- Validate JSON text
- Beautify 
- Minify
- Convert to XML
- Convert to CSV
- Import / Export files
- Hightlight line that has error
- Colorize input text
- Ability to make app default for .json, .txt and .text file types

9PK2JHM3C71C.title: Dead by Daylight: CHAINS OF HATE Chapter Windows
9PK2JHM3C71C.description: Chains of Hate is a new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a Killer, The Deathslinger, a Survivor, Zarina Kassir and a Map. Purchasing the add-on will unlock its new Killer, new Survivor, and an exclusive item for the survivor.

9MV537XVLVXR.title: Death's Gambit: Afterlife
9MV537XVLVXR.description: A contract binds you to Death who seeks to eradicate immortality. Will you do his bidding and restore the natural order, or succumb to its power in this hardcore 2D action RPG?

9PCKNHVF619T.title: Invoice Creator PRO
9PCKNHVF619T.description: Simply create fully customized invoices with various of possibilities.

9PGJKJV8XB1X.title: Drop It: Block Paradise!
9PGJKJV8XB1X.description: A block dropping physics-based puzzle game featuring: 150 levels, 70 bonus levels, level editor, online user levels and more!

9MVKT8ZTD8SW.title: The Joker
9MVKT8ZTD8SW.description: Unpredictable, violent and incredibly dangerous, The Joker is chaos personified. He’s killed a Robin, crippled Batgirl and tortured and murdered countless people throughout the DC universe. And now, he’s the latest Kombatant to join in Mortal Kombat.

9NL4KWXLM4H1.title: PC Screen Recorder: Screen&Audio capture device
9NL4KWXLM4H1.description:
Win10 device screen recording software UWP version.
Simple interface and simple operation.
Record the entire device screen/selected application window.
Video frame rate and resolution are optional.
# Supports simultaneous recording of video + audio capture devices (such as microphones, etc.), currently does not support internal recording (ie system audio/sound card, etc.), those who need this, please consider carefully before installing this software.
Suitable for recording short videos, learning tutorials, etc.

Suggest:
Contact email: singhwongwxg@hotmail.com
The screen capture function is based on an open source project: https://github.com/robmikh/SimpleRecorder

9PHS5Q7KQMJM.title: Pathologic 2
9PHS5Q7KQMJM.description: Pathologic 2 is a narrative-driven dramatic thriller about fighting a deadly outbreak in a secluded rural town. You are a healer, and to save anyone, you'll have to survive in this bleak and strange world, where even food and medicine are scarce.

9PBG986PTC9X.title: Sindel
9PBG986PTC9X.description: The former Queen of Edenia will stop at nothing to keep her place. Sindel betrayed her husband, and her people, to keep her privileged position. Now Shao Kahn's wife and Queen of Outworld, she enjoys power and wealth beyond most people's imagination.

9NGHPCSC5XTV.title: SCORPIO PLAYER X - The Ultimate Video Player
9NGHPCSC5XTV.description: SCORPIO PLAYER is a modern and full-feature powerful universal media player for Windows 10/11 and Xbox

9NQT1336LCNZ.title: Romancing SaGa 3
9NQT1336LCNZ.description: The celebrated RPG classic comes West for the first time! Romancing SaGa™ 3 was originally released in Japan in 1995. This HD remaster of the legendary RPG masterpiece introduces optimized graphics, a new dungeon  to explore, new scenarios and a new game+ function.

9N29SR96GQS4.title: Dead by Daylight: DEMISE OF THE FAITHFUL Chapter Windows
9N29SR96GQS4.description: DEMISE OF THE FAITHFUL is a Chapter for Dead by Daylight and it includes a new Killer, a Survivor and a Map.

9N2P7KNZ816R.title: Dead by Daylight: SAW® Chapter Windows
9N2P7KNZ816R.description: The Saw™ Chapter is a Chapter for Dead by Daylight and it includes a new Killer, a Survivor and a Map.

9N55M38QNMCS.title: Dead by Daylight: Ash vs Evil Dead Windows
9N55M38QNMCS.description: Ash Williams, the legendary hero from the Ash vs Evil Dead horror series, has entered the realm of the Entity. While this time the chainsaw is not his to wield, Ash knows how to escape gruesome death. Wander through The Fog as Ash and escape evil once more.

9N78HGQN56L7.title: Dead by Daylight: SHATTERED BLOODLINE Chapter Windows
9N78HGQN56L7.description: SHATTERED BLOODLINE is a Chapter for Dead by Daylight and it includes a new Killer, a Survivor and a Map.

9NCLGTXXZ18Q.title: Dead by Daylight: Headcase Windows
9NCLGTXXZ18Q.description: In the The Realm of the Entity, temperatures drop very fast as you wander the Fog pursued by cold-minded killers. Still, there's no reason to drop your style. Even the most fashionable outfit isn't complete without the perfect hairstyle or accessory. However as fabulous as you look, your stylish new looks are unlikely to protect you. Well-groomed survivors make for well-groomed corpses.

9NF6VS6NVC2P.title: Dead by Daylight: The 80's Suitcase Windows
9NF6VS6NVC2P.description: Dress your favourite survivor with iconic pieces of fashion from the 80’s!

9NJ77BPBRSFH.title: Dead by Daylight: HALLOWEEN® Chapter Windows
9NJ77BPBRSFH.description: HALLOWEEN® is a Chapter for Dead by Daylight, where you’ll witness the purest form of evil. Where pain is the beginning and death is the end. You’ll get to meet Michael Myers himself. Together with Laurie Strode, you’ll either fight for survival or slaughter in their old hometown, Haddonfield.

9NJQTSL5PZJL.title: Dead by Daylight: Of Flesh and Mud Windows
9NJQTSL5PZJL.description:
Of Flesh and Mud is the third Chapter for Dead by Daylight. Prepare for dark hexes and flesh made out of mud and decay, if you dare enter Backwater Swamp and live through the horror it brings. A new killer - The Hag - awaits you in the waterland area and you will meet a new survivor: Ace Visconti.

A hag driven to madness by being devoured alive piece by piece. A survivor that believes luck is always on his side. A wetland with scorched shacks, an eerie mud maze and a rusting boat graveyard lays ahead of you, so tread carefully.

9NKNQ2DZMLZW.title: Dead by Daylight: Leatherface™ Windows
9NKNQ2DZMLZW.description: This is slaughter in its purest form. A kind of slaughter driven by a pure need of flesh. Leatherface won’t fail and he won’t stop. As the chainsaw starts, pain and fear will hit you, as you realize that you won’t just die - you will also end up on someone’s dinner plate.

9NMC8SZPD9GF.title: Dead by Daylight: Ghost Face® Windows
9NMC8SZPD9GF.description:
Ghost Face® is joining Dead by Daylight. Lurking in the shroud of night, he is a natural stalker who observes his victims before striking.  

The Ghost Face DLC includes two exclusive items for The Ghost Face: the body Monochrome Maniac and weapon Silvery Steel Tactical Knife. These items are only available as part of the DLC.

9NW55H5J9NH2.title: Dead by Daylight: The Bloodstained Sack Windows
9NW55H5J9NH2.description: The Bloodstained Sack will allow you to pick up your favourite killing outfit before you start your next chase.

9NX58MLKKQWD.title: Dead by Daylight: Spark of Madness Windows
9NX58MLKKQWD.description: The Spark of Madness Chapter includes a new Killer, a Survivor and a Map.

9P0HLNG7X2D0.title: Dead by Daylight: CURTAIN CALL Chapter Windows
9P0HLNG7X2D0.description: The CURTAIN CALL Chapter is a Chapter for Dead by Daylight and it includes a new Killer, a Survivor and a Map.

9P62QBBJZSD4.title: Dead by Daylight: DARKNESS AMONG US Chapter Windows
9P62QBBJZSD4.description: Default Short DescriptionDarkness Among Us is a brand-new Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It includes a new Killer, a Survivor, a Map and an exclusive item for the new survivor

9NWN3JD9QL2S.title: Image Converter Plus
9NWN3JD9QL2S.description:
Free for the owners of our another product Video Converter - Plus

Image Converter Plus is easy to use, fast, offline and a powerful converter that supports over 100 formats including Jpeg, Bmp, Gif, Heic, Tiff, Png, Svg and many more.

Some features:
- Support over 100 file types (Jpeg,   Bmp, Gif, Heic, Tiff, Png, Svg, ...)
- Simple and easy to use
- Drag and drop your File
- Batch conversion
- No internet required
- Preview image
- Free lifetime free updates and new features

9P5DBRKTVQNM.title: Masquerade Skin Pack
9P5DBRKTVQNM.description: The Masquerade Skin Pack includes three new character skins, just in time for Halloween. Play as Wicked Witch Jade, Psyko Killer Kabal and Calavera Liu Kang.

9N69W1GG9R5K.title: Terminator T-800
9N69W1GG9R5K.description: The Terminator T-800 from "Terminator: Dark Fate" is a cyborg assassin, sent back in time from a post-apocalyptic future. He is nearly indestructible and possesses superior technology, fighting skills and artificial intelligence making him the ultimate killing machine.

9NQ8HXNT9WXV.title: Angelo and Deemon: One Hell of a Quest
9NQ8HXNT9WXV.description: Once upon a time, the Grim Reaper chose the wrong door. Angelo – a young lazy bum-a-holic, oh sorry - a blogger, powered only by his blogging skills, must turn on “point-n-click adventure” mode, go around the entire inferno, meet the locals, and somehow get back home. Enjoy Hell! We made it just for you.

C1GF4G7G2X10.title: Nightwolf
C1GF4G7G2X10.description: Every generation, the Great Spirit chooses a warrior to become Nightwolf: the Matoka's champion. As Nightwolf, Grey Cloud possesses extraordinary magic. He uses it to fight for the Matoka's future, and defend all of Earthrealm.

9NGB2C4R0R22.title: Sphere Game Xbox One/Windows
9NGB2C4R0R22.description: This is the first game in the Sphere game franchise.

BVWP3QJKLXL8.title: Shang Tsung
BVWP3QJKLXL8.description: Soul Sorcerer and historic host of the Mortal Kombat, Shang Tsung's relentless pursuit of powerful magic led him to Outworld, where Shao Kahn offered him a dark power that no sorcerer on Earthrealm could. He dreams of the day his sorcery will overtake Shao Kahn's.

9NJNQQ13CL42.title: Undead Horde
9NJNQQ13CL42.description: Become a necromancer and raise the dead. Undead Horde is an action RPG and an RTS in an undead package. Command, lead, raze, loot, and fight your way through the lands of the living with your horde. Ultimately claim back the kingdom for the Undead Horde!

BRH1C1C9HK8B.title: Shao Kahn
BRH1C1C9HK8B.description:
Play as Shao Kahn, fully playable character.

Emperor of Outworld. For millennia, Shao Kahn dominated the realms, rapidly expanding his Empire by conquest. But when he set out to claim Earthrealm, he was blocked by the rules of Mortal Kombat.

BTJPC1C99FS4.title: Mortal Kombat 11 Kombat Pack 1
BTJPC1C99FS4.description:
Kombat Pack includes:
• 6 new add-on playable characters including Shang Tsung, Nightwolf, Terminator T-800, Sindel, The Joker and Spawn
• 7 Kombat Pack Exclusive Character Skins
• 6 themed Skin Packs including the Klassic Arcade Ninjas, Klassic Arcade Fighters, DC Elseworlds and more

C20WW4W29FQ1.title: Generation Zero®
C20WW4W29FQ1.description: Generation Zero is a stealth-action shooter where you wage guerilla warfare against lethal mechanical enemies. Explore a vast open world map inspired by the Swedish Cold War era, take part in the resistance alone or with up to three friends in seamless co-op.

9NPGTNQFC8B5.title: FINAL FANTASY IX
9NPGTNQFC8B5.description:
Selling over five million copies since its release in 2000, FINAL FANTASY IX proudly returns on Xbox One and PC!

Experience the adventure once again with characters and pre-rendered movies featured in high definition, as well as a new booster system with a selection of various modes such as "high speed" or "no encounters"!

9PK1BPWQ6BXG.title: Stormhill Mystery: Family Shadows
9PK1BPWQ6BXG.description: Stormhill Mystery: Family Shadows is a fantastic casual puzzle adventure game. This is an excellent family story with a paranormal twist! Your family’s past is more interesting than any story. And it's not over yet...

9NKBFX4N7GPM.title: Pirate Monkey Run!
9NKBFX4N7GPM.description: Help Jake and Jade to collect bananas and coconuts.

9MXWDPHJXPPP.title: DYNASTY WARRIORS 8: Xtreme Legends Definitive Edition
9MXWDPHJXPPP.description:
"Dynasty Warriors 8: Xtreme Legends" introduces entirely new levels of fun to the refreshing gameplay vanquishing swarms of enemies with mighty warriors found in "Dynasty Warriors 8."
A premium edition that includes most of the DLC! (some collaboration DLC not included)

A benchmark program is available now at https://www.koeitecmoamerica.com/dw8xl/dx_bench/. Please confirm whether your device meets the system requirements before purchasing.

9N6JVKJH4FFL.title: M-Player
9N6JVKJH4FFL.description:
The local video player UWP can not only play videos, but also play pure audio.
The interface is simple, the operation is simple, the full format is supported, the system occupation is low, and the playback function meets the daily playback needs.

9N0LZBPRNSBF.description:
The software has a one-month trial period. Full version please search Home NAS . Support for OneDrive. BT and MagnetLink downloding capabilities . Video Edit. The app is a stand-alone version with no capabilities of collecting your privacy for advertising. UWP architecture, secure, without any residual files after uninstalled.

I can only guess by name, or open the video file and click the progress bar to check.  Jumping between the folders is very troublesome, inconvenient, and experience is extremely poor.
4. I need a simple solution somewhat like iPhone, like click the poster, check the details, and begin to playback from right the time I preferred, three simple clicks, that's all it needs. No more folders
5. Here it is, this AV Collector. Each item in this program needs a poster and a video file. After paired and labeled, it looks very handy and extremely simple. It's somewhat like the difference between bicycle and automatic gear car.           
6. The playback page supports voice control. So you can free your hands
7. This is not entirely commercial ad, dude, just have a try.

Volume Down，Volume Up，
Accelerate，Decelerate，Backward，Forward，Skip Forward，Skip Backward
Full Screen，Exit FullScreen
Next Track，Next Video，Next Time Span，Previous Track，Previous Video，Previous Time Span
Play，Continue，Pause，Start，Stop，Hello，Hi
